description: This file defines a custom React hook called useLocalStorage, which synchronizes a state variable with localStorage, providing persistence across sessions and synchronization across tabs.

methods.name: useLocalStorage(key, initialValue)
methods.description: A custom hook that manages a piece of state synchronized with localStorage, initializing the state from localStorage if available and updating storage whenever the state changes. It also listens for storage events to keep the state in sync across multiple tabs.
